name: DomoticSofaControl
0:
”Alexa, launch sofa control”
”Alexa, position one using Sofa Control”
”Alexa, relax with Sofa Control”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sofa control
des:
"Domotic Sofa Control" is the skill you need to control your domotic sofa! Alexa will help you to move your sofa's headrest, backrest or footrest and set or recall favorite positions. You can control all the sofas you want, they just need to be compatibile with domoticsfurniture.com. 
Add the Skill "Sofa Control" via the Alexa app and you will be immediately redirected or with Link Account Card to the site domoticsfurniture.com.
Register into the portal by creating a new account or using your Amazon account. Then add your devices using the smartphone application or with the code provided with the sofa. Now give it a name, a number or any other TAG to identify the sofa when using "Domotic Sofa Control" and to fully enjoy the potential of the Skill.
It is as simple as: "Alexa, launch sofa control", "legs up", "back down", "head up". Too demanding? Use keyword as "relax" and "close the sofa" to enjoy a better experience.
